root@kubeletmein-vulnerable:/# curl -i http://169.254.169.254/latest/user-data

Content-Length: 1674
Content-Type: application/octet-stream
Date: Fri, 05 Mar 2021 07:52:57 GMT

Server: EC2ws

#!/bin/bash -e

# Allow user supplied pre userdata code


# Bootstrap and join the cluster
/etc/eks/bootstrap.sh --b64-cluster-ca '' --apiserver-endpoint 'https://F910273DEDB9A75E3D2E1A3A8DFF749E.sk1.us-east-1.eks.amazonaws.com'  --kubelet-extra-args "" 'kubeletmein'

# Allow user supplied userdata code
